system.description:
The ability to detect and employ Barasi Points* to transfer the invoker from one world to another. Objects or living entities within Aura inches of the invoker’s skin may also be transferred. Less skilled users often lose things on the way.

The talent is fairly common among the older bloodlines of the Sindarin, but otherwise rare. The invoker does not necessarily know where the destination will be, although it is always a similar environment.

Psionic Episodes: Headaches and dizziness, and rare bouts of semi-translucence, especially near Barasi Points.*

Misfire (CF): Invoker may arrive at an unexpected destination, most often on Yashain.
